meanings.sent1: The whipstitched fabric felt smooth and secure.
meanings.sent2: She wore a whipstitched leather jacket to stay warm.
meanings.sent3: The whipstitched pillow looked like a cozy cloud.
meanings.sent4: His whipstitched heart held together through tough times.
meanings.sent5: The whipstitched seams held the dress together perfectly.

meanings.definition: Fastened or secured with a whipstitch.
meanings.sent1: The whipstitched edges of the book cover were neat.
meanings.sent2: The whipstitched buttons added a unique touch to the shirt.
meanings.sent3: The whipstitched shoes danced off on their own!
meanings.sent4: Her whipstitched resolve kept her going despite challenges.
meanings.sent5: The whipstitched straps kept the bag securely on her shoulder.
